title: Centuries Collide: American History
overview: Centuries Collide: American History is an educational comedy series that tells America's story like you've never heard it before. Stitching together travel, history, and sketch comedy, this fast-paced, family-friendly show is for kids and adults alike. From Jamestown to the civil rights movement, the American Revolution to the New Deal, the sixteen-episode series tackles our nation's past and what it can teach us about the present... which, as it turns out, is a whole lot!
